project.name: MapComplete Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities
project.description: On this map, you'll find various interesting places for you pets: veterinarians, dog parks, pet shops, dog-friendly restaurants,
project.contact_name: Pieter Vander Vennet, Niels Elgaard Larsen

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities has a layer dog parks showing features with this tag

Layer 'dog parks' shows barrier=fence with a fixed text, namely 'This dogpark is fenced all around' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities')

Layer 'dog parks' shows barrier=no with a fixed text, namely 'This dogpark is not fenced all around' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities')

Layer 'dog parks' shows small_dog=separate with a fixed text, namely 'Have separate area for puppies and small dogs' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities')

Layer 'dog parks' shows small_dog=shared with a fixed text, namely 'Does not have a separate area for puppies and small dogs' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities')
Layer 'dog parks' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Veterinarians, dog parks and other pet-amenities')

The layer 'dog parks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'dog parks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

Layer 'Dog friendly eateries' shows amenity=fast_food with a fixed text, namely 'This is a fastfood-business, focused on fast service.
